data.meta_description: Schott Funeral Homes in Forest City & Lake Mills, IA provides funeral, memorial, aftercare, pre-planning, and cremation services t... Learn More
data.text:
Welcome!

Welcome and thank you for your interest in SCHOTT FUNERAL HOMES. We know that every family is different in their wants and needs, we are here to listen to your request, offer advice and go above and beyond to make sure that the service you receive is as caring and individual as the families we serve. Our professional staff, licensed in both Minnesota and Iowa, is here to serve you 24 hours a day, every day of the year. We have been serving families in North Iowa and Southern Minnesota since 1960. We are a family-owned funeral home. You are very important to us!

Please call us (641) 585-2685 (Forest City Chapel) 505 North Clark St. Forest City, IA 50436 or 641-592-0221 (Mittelstadt Chapel) 902 East Main Street, Lake Mills, IA 50450 or through our contact form) our knowledgeable staff and let us know what we can do for you.

Isaiah and Tasha Schott

Amy Edgerton, Spenser Brackey and Bart Winter

Who We Are

We're dedicated to providing personalized, professional and compassionate services to help lighten your burden and support you through the difficult times that follow the loss of a loved one. We're honored to assist you in your time of need, and would like to assure you that we'll do everything in our power to make your experience meaningful and memorable.

Honoring Veterans

We are proud to do our part in honoring our country's veterans and give back to those whose sacrifice and patriotism have defined our great nation. Our duty as a funeral home is to provide you and your family with professional and dignified assistance during your time of need and to support you in honoring your loved one for their dedication and selfless service.
